(799x1+0)/1 mod 8192 = 799. (799x3+1)/2 mod 4096 = 1199. (799x9+5)/4 mod 2048 = 1799. (799x27+19)/8 mod 1024 = 651. (799x81+65)/16 mod 512 = 465. (799x243+211)/32 mod 256 = 186. (799x243+211)/64 mod 128 = 93. (799x729+697)/128 mod 64 = 12. (799x729+697)/256 mod 32 = 6. (799x729+697)/512 mod 16 = 3. (799x2187+2603)/1024 mod 8 = 5. (799x6561+8833)/2048 mod 4 = 0. (799x6561+8833)/4096 mod 2 = 0. (799x6561+8833)/8192 mod 1 = 0.
